Title: Create a Travel Requests by Department Report
Functional Specifications:
Good example of Add Metadata use case.


In Dev4, follow the requirements and specifications on Create a Travel Requests by Department Report


Do NOT Commit on this User Story; rather, use the Add Metadata button in the User Story Quick Actions to Add and Save the new Report for use in a non-Git Org-to-Org Deployment.


NOTE: Since we typically recommend Customers remove the Add Metadata button; you may need to re-add it to your User Story Layout.


Promote/Deploy to DevMerge, QA and UAT; Back Promote to all "sibling" Dev Sandboxes

Title: Create a Travel Approvals Dashboard
Functional Specifications:
Good example of Add Metadata use case.


In Dev4, follow the requirements and specifications on Create a Travel Approvals Dashboard


Additional Bootcamp customization:

> Create a new Dashboard Folder called "Travel Requests Dashboards"

> Make sure to Share this Dashboard Folder with Public Group "All Internal Users"

> Make sure your new Dashboard is saved in your new Dashboard Folder


Do NOT Commit on this User Story; rather, use the Add Metadata button in the User Story Quick Actions to Add and Save the new Dashboard and Folder for use in a non-Git Org-to-Org Deployment.


Promote/Deploy to DevMerge, QA and UAT; Back Promote to all "sibling" Dev Sandboxes
